programlisting:
<CsoundSynthesizer> <CsOptions> ; Select audio/midi flags here according to platform ; Audio out Audio in -odac -iadc ;;;RT audio I/O ; For Non-realtime ouput leave only the line below: ; -o readk.wav -W ;;; for file output any platform </CsOptions> <CsInstruments>
; Initialize the global variables. sr = 44100 kr = 4410 ksmps = 10 nchnls = 1
0dbfs = 1 ; By Andres Cabrera 2008
instr 1 ; Read a number from the file every 0.5 seconds kfibo readk "fibonacci.txt", 7, 0.5 kpitchclass = 8 + ((kfibo % 12)/100) printk2 kpitchclass kcps = cpspch( kpitchclass ) printk2 kcps a1 oscil 0.5, kcps, 1 out a1 endin
</CsInstruments> <CsScore> f 1 0 1024 10 1 i 1 0 10 e
</CsScore> </CsoundSynthesizer>
